td.content: s:female aged 24 years c/o 6 weeks h/o moderate loss of appetite. NKDA. Patient is a moderate drinker she states she has never smoked a cigarette in her life o:Height 167 cm, Weight 64.9 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 17 a:Ovarian Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to oncology.

s:pt presents with 7 weeks history of moderate loss of appetite, moderate lower abdominal pressure and moderate vague pain in left upper quadrant. pt is a white female aged 24 years. o:Height 167 cm, Weight 65.3 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 115, DiastolicBP 77, Respiration 17 a:Ovarian Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed cisplatin - 75 mg/m2 IV.

s:a 24 YO female presents with 2 months history of mild diarrhea. pt also reports increased frequency of mild constipation, mild flatulence. o:Height 167 cm, Weight 63.8 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 16, all lung fields, Abdomen = mild epigastric tenderness, distension, no hepatomegaly a:Irritable Bowel p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed dicyclomine - 20 mg 4 x day, and ordered CBC.

s:a 24 yo f student describes moderate vague pain in left upper quadrant, moderate lower abdominal pressure and moderate loss of appetite. o:Height 167 cm, Weight 65 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 77, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 17 a:Ovarian Cancer p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed cisplatin - 75 mg/m2 IV, and ordered pelvic US.
